name: morphing (Game Sunlight)
description:
Hi! It's just a small indie project where I trained to do morphing in animation. It was made in a single movement, but I broke it into several animations.

There are buttons on the side, when pressed, the animation switches.

And on the left you can search for the secret button to view the animation without interruption.

Thank you for watching! I love such projects and drawing with a pencil texture in digital. This project was made using TVPaint and Construct 2.

Here I am under the nickname game sunlight, but in VK you can find me here: https://vk.com/cerdcevina

________________________________

Speaking of pencil-drawn games, I still have a dress-up game (click on the picture :))

I have some more cool projects! Click on the picture :)
